about_the_game:
Protocol Aftertime is a platformer adventure game that combines the character development of the protagonist Jericho with varied gameplay in two high-contrast worlds.

Through space and time

Travel to ancient Greece and explore the abandoned space station Hermes of the fourth millennium! Learn about the origins of science from the philosophers and experience first-hand the inventions and discoveries of future scientists!

Learn to understand

Control time and manipulate gravity to overcome the seemingly impossible. Master immersive platformer passages, discover hidden chambers, and become more powerful. Internalize your essence and discover your true potential!

Unleash your old mind

Solve unique puzzles that even change the position of the sun, defeat Olympian deities, conquer gravity and find answers to your most important questions. Accept loneliness and master the totality of all things!

Decipher Protocol Aftertime

Survive the emotions on a journey that takes you further and further away from your destination. You want to get back to a family whose connection you feel but don't understand, and which threatens to drift further away from you with every step.

About the developers

Protocol Aftertime is the debut game from the independent two-man team Neverfly Games based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Protocol Aftertime

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The minimum requirements may change in the future.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience an action-filled platformer, mind-bending puzzles, and foreign worlds in a story about hope and responsibility, reaching far in the past and beyond the future.  Learn, to understand, become aware, to truly awaken.
